name: Flaxseed Harvesting Node
description: This activates a flaxseed harvesting node within your home instance for daily gathering.

name: Blood Ruby Band (Infused)
description: <c=@flavor>Quivering with unstable magical energy.</c>

name: Bloodstone Fen Portal Scroll
description: Double-click to teleport to the Pride of the Pact in Bloodstone Fen. <c=@Warning>This item cannot be used while in combat.</c>

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Alpine Lily
description: A beautiful tribute for Eir.

description: This activates a hard wood logging node within your home instance for daily gathering.

name: Lord Caudecus's Sword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword. This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.

name: Bloodstone Empowerment
description: Permanently gain 10% bonus experience in Bloodstone Fen. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Embellished Torch Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other torch.

name: Ascended Salvage Kit
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an ascended item in your inventory. Stabilizing Matrices can be salvaged from rings. Dark Energy and other items can be salvaged from weapons, armor, and other trinkets.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

description: Contains basic crafting materials with a chance to get ascended materials.

name: Chest of the Bloodstone Fen Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Sip of Liquid Karma, 1 Blood Ruby, 25 Unbound Magic, and 1 Scrap of Maguuma Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Apprentice Kasandra's Diary
description: Double-click to read.

name: Blood Ruby Band
description: <c=@flavor>Quivering with unstable magical energy.</c>

name: Noble's Folly Pass
description:
Located in Verdant Brink.
• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.

name: Bloodstone Capacitor
description:
Consume to emit a pulse of magic that resets one of each type of Blood Ruby gear in your inventory.
<c=@Warning>This will destroy any infusions socketed in those items.</c>

description: Contains rare crafting materials.

description: Contains rare crafting materials.

name: Sentient Anomaly
description: Double-click to feed 25 Piles of Bloodstone Dust and 25 Dragonite Ore to the Sentient Anomaly. The anomaly can devour a limited amount of materials each day.

name: Grand Savant Valis the Learned's Research Journal (Incomplete)

name: Massively Discounted Anguished Tear of Alba
description:
Purchase Limit: 5
Price increases when purchase limit is reached.
This item grants an Anguished Tear of Alba, which can be consumed to grant 10 agony resistance for 1 hour.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, grants an additional 5 agony resistance.

Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

name: Bloodstone Indigo
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Storm Bow
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow. This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>There are stories of those who traversed the depths of the Underworld for this lightning-imbued bow hundreds of years ago.</c>

name: Bloodstone Visage Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any headgear.

name: Levvi's Device
description: Double-click to scan for life-forms with high concentrations of bloodstone energy.

name: Emissary's Staff
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other staff. This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>It is said that this staff was carried by Heleyne, one of the Envoys that served as shepherds of souls into the Mists.</c>

name: Shattered Bloodstone Circlet
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other helmet. This skin will be unlocked in your wardrobe for future use.

name: Bloodstone Coral
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Blue Shift Dye Kit
description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Anniversary Backpack and Mail Carrier Pack
description: Double-click to choose an exclusive city-themed backpack and receive an anniversary mail carrier.

name: Bloodstone Dark Indigo
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Anniversary Mail Carrier
description: Unlocks the ability for characters on your account to customize the way they send mail to other players and receive game mail.

name: Bloodstone Dark Violet
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Bloodstone Dark Coral
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Bloodstone Dye Kit
description: Double-click to gain one random color. Includes six exclusive Bloodstone colors.

name: Bloodstone Dye Pack
description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Bloodstone Violet
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Amethyst Aegis
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>Flawlessly cut amethyst capped with a smooth golden trim, this shield was the ultimate prize for soldiers of the past.</c>

name: Mini Jungle Lord Faren
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Bloodstone Staff Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Great Destroyer's Talon
description: <c=@flavor>Still burning with an inner fire.</c>

name: Peacock Scepter Skin
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>This elegant scepter was the most desired weapon amongst mesmers of the past.</c>

name: Elemental Sword
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other sword. This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>Dismissed by many as a mere myth, this rare blade was long pursued by the heroes of ages past.</c>

name: Bloodstone Pistol Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Kurzick Dual Axe Skin
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>Threatening yet elegant, this Canthan axe was the weapon of choice for Kurzick warriors.</c>

name: Bloodstone Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current helm. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

description: Double-click to use. Unlocks the account-wide ability to become a commander and the green commander icon.

name: Bloodstone Sword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Dragon Kama Skin
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>This was said to be one of the most sought-after weapons in the Echovald Forest.</c>

name: Peg-Leg Boots Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current boots. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Bloodstone Greatsword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Pirate Hook Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current gloves. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

description: Double-click to use. Unlocks the account-wide ability to become a commander and the orange commander icon.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other torch.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other warhorn.

name: Destroyer Weapon Crate
description: Double-click to open. Contains a choice of one account-bound Primordus weapon. Unlocks the Primordus Weapons collection.

name: Bloodstone Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Bloodstone Dagger Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Pulsating Destroyer Heart
description: Obtained by aiding in Destroyer research in Ember Bay. Used only as part of the Primordus Weapon collection.

name: Bloodstone Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Bloodstone Longbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Mystic Curio
description: Used to craft legendary weapon shards.

name: Mini Rolling Devil
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mystic Runestone
description: Used in the Mystic Forge to create legendary weapons.

name: Gift of Eureka
description: Used to forge the legendary mace Eureka.

name: Reclaimed Wood Chunk
description: Salvage Item

name: Pocket Jade Armor
description:
Double-click to summon a pet Jade Armor for 5 minutes. This can only be used once every 30 minutes.
<c=flavor>I'm still working on the size issue.
—Explorer Rakk</c>

name: Soot-Covered Ring
description: This soot-covered ring appears to be humming with magic.

name: Draconic Headdress Box
description: Open to choose a Draconic Headdress.

name: Chunk of the Solid Ocean
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Chest of Legendary Shards
description: Contains a choice of legendary weapon shards.

name: Salvaged Debris
description: Shinies gathered from shipwreck debris by a skritt worker.

name: Mini Pirate Captain Huuhes
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Petrified Karka Egg
description:
<c=@flavor>Even with the effects of the fluctuating magical energies on this island, this egg must date from sometime around the rising of Orr.
—Scientist Vratt</c>

name: Mini Vine-Touched Destroyer Crab
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Chest of Fractal Relics
description: Contains 100 Fractal Relics.

name: Sparking Petrified Wood
description: <c=@flavor>Constantly sparking with unbound magic.</c>

name: Shard of Endeavor
description:
Used to craft the legendary mace precursor Endeavor.
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Mystic Runestones, a Gift of Metal, and a Gift of the Mists to create the Gift of Eureka.

name: Rurik's Engagement Ring
description:
<c=@flavor>A token of my eternal love.
—Althea Barradin</c>

name: Tribute to Endeavor
description: Use weaponsmithing to refine into Shards of Endeavor, used to craft the legendary mace precursor Endeavor.

name: Ember Bay Portal Scroll
description: Double-click to teleport to the Asuran Beachhead in Ember Bay. <c=@Warning>This item cannot be used while in combat.</c>

name: Rurik's Engagement Ring
description:
<c=@flavor>A token of my eternal love.
—Althea Barradin</c>

name: Bundle of Petrified Wood
description: Can be consumed for unbound magic or traded with Scholar Surra.

name: Unbound Logging Axe
description:
Used to chop down all saplings.

Rewards unbound magic on each swing in addition to logging results.

name: Petrified Wood
description: Can be consumed for unbound magic or traded with Scholar Surra.

name: Cosmic Logging Tool
description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

name: Circus Voucher
description: A discount voucher earned by aiding Ivy's Circus Spectacular.

name: Rurik's Engagement Ring
description:
<c=@flavor>A token of my eternal love.
—Althea Barradin</c>

name: Sack of Petrified Wood
description: Double-click to open.

name: Dragonscale Epaulettes Box
description: Open to choose Dragonscale Epaulettes.

details.name: Nourishment
details.description:
100% Chance to Gain Fury on Kill
+70 Ferocity
+10% Experience from Kills

name: Fragments of the Solid Ocean
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: Mini Captain Grumby
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Spire of the Solid Ocean
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Mini Lava Elemental
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Infinite Mist Mobility Potion
description:
Increases movement speed in the Fractals of the Mists. Grants five stacks of the standard potion.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to concentration.
Turn in unwanted potions to Dessa's Alchemist for Fractal Relics.

name: Aqueous Amulet
description:
<c=@flavor>This amulet appears to have a minor dampening effect on the Destroyers, and it is always strangely cool to the touch.
—Researcher Twilli</c>
